header.description: The Access-Control-Allow-Origin response header indicates whether the response can be shared with requesting code from the given [origin](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Glossary/Origin). - [MDN Link](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTTP/Headers/Access-Control-Allow-Origin)

The Access-Control-Allow-Credentials response header tells browsers whether to expose the response to the frontend JavaScript code when the request's credentials mode ([Request.credentials](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/Request/credentials)) is include. - [MDN Link](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTTP/Headers/Access-Control-Allow-Credentials)
